arabicText: ۞ سَيَقُولُ ٱلسُّفَهَآءُ مِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَا وَلَّىٰهُمْ عَن قِبْلَتِهِمُ ٱلَّتِى كَانُوا۟ عَلَيْهَا ۚ قُل لِّلَّهِ ٱلْمَشْرِقُ وَٱلْمَغْرِبُ ۚ يَهْدِى مَن يَشَآءُ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍۢ مُّسْتَقِيمٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
So	now	the	 foolish	people	will	say,	“What	
has	 turned	 the	 Muslims	 away	 from	 the	
qiblah	 (prayer	 direction)	 which	 they	
formerly	 observed?”;	 proclaim,	 “To	 Allah
only	 belong	 the	 East	 and	 the	 West;	 He	
guides	 whomever	 He	 wills	 upon	 the	
Straight	Path.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ab	 kaheñge	 bewakoof	 log, kis	 ne	 pher	
diya	 Musalmanoñ	 ko	 unke	 is	 qibla	 se	 jis	
par	 they	 tum	 farma	 do	 ke	 purab	
pachchhim (Mashriq	wa	Magrib) sab	Allah	
hi	ka	hai	jise	chāhe	seedhi	rāh	chalāta	hai.
